snippet: The American Red Cross struggled on Friday to reassure beleaguered New York City residents that its disaster-relief efforts were at last getting up to speed.
abstract: American Red Cross struggles to reassure beleaguered New York City residents that its disaster-relief efforts are at last getting up to speed; delayed arrival of agency's emergency response vehicles to devastated areas of Staten Island, Brooklyn and Queens drew intense criticism.
lead_paragraph: The American Red Cross struggled on Friday to reassure beleaguered New York City residents that its disaster-relief efforts were at last getting up to speed.

headline.seo: Anger Grows at the Red Cross Response to the Storm
headline.main: Anger Grows at Response by Red Cross
headline.print_headline: Anger Grows At Response By Red Cross
